title: Account Management
implementation_guidance: Must use SSO (Okta/AzureAD) for all production access. Manual creation of accounts is prohibited without Change Request.

title: Unsuccessful Logon Attempts
implementation_guidance: System must lock account after 3 invalid attempts within 15 minutes. Lockout duration must be at least 30 minutes.

title: Event Logging
implementation_guidance: Audit logs must capture: Successful/Unsuccessful logons, Privilege changes, and File access. Logs must be shipped to SIEM (Datadog/Splunk).

title: Identification and Authentication
implementation_guidance: MFA is mandatory for all remote access and access to CJI. NIST AAL2 compliant authenticators required.
